articles.content: Using NASA's Swift spacecraft, an international team of astronomers has discovered a luminous and slowly-evolving nuclear transient event. The origin of the newly detected transient, designated Swift… [+3479 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: House and Senate appropriators cut NASA's budget - SpaceNews
articles.description: House and Senate appropriators have drafted bills that would give NASA slightly less money in 2024 than it received in 2023.
articles.content: WASHINGTON House and Senate appropriators have drafted bills that would give NASA slightly less money in 2024 than it received in 2023, rather than the significant increase the administration request… [+4663 chars]
